channel.title: Cpps on Hank's Cyberton
channel.description: Recent content in Cpps on Hank's Cyberton

item.title: Basic Kernel Programming
item.description: When the first caveman programmer chiseled the first program on the walls of the first cave computer, it was a program to paint the string Hello, world' in Antelope pictures. Roman programming textbooks began with theSalut, Mundi’ program. I don’t know what happens to people who break with this tradition, but I think it’s safer not to find out. We’ll start with a series of hello world programs that demonstrate the different aspects of the basics of writing a kernel module.
